text: {"answer": "A", "reasoning": "i incorrect: Classical Roman jurists (e.g., Sabinians) held treasure on another's land belonged entirely to landowner; half-half was later equitable adoption by Justinian/imperial. ii incorrect: Legal sociologists observe societal phenomena empirically first, do not prescribe normative ends beforehand. v incorrect: Act of Mediation (1803) ended Helvetic Republic (1798), creating mediated Confederation."}
